proposal: Diving into the world of ShivWifHat, it's clear you're not just another ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain. With 62 holders in the ETH network, you're carving out a unique space. How about we bring our DEX and Lottery tools into the mix? They're not just revenue streams; they're a way for your community to actively shape the ecosystem. Let's make blockchain more than just transactions, shall we?
